direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods involve removing elements from the collection, though removeAll removes multiple elements at once.
Both methods modify the collection by removing elements, but retainAll keeps only the elements in the specified collection.
Both methods involve conditional removal of elements from the collection, though removeIf uses a predicate for filtering.
Both methods remove elements from the collection, but clear removes all elements, while removeAll removes only those in the specified collection.

enhanced_by.reason: Both methods require the bag to be initialized before performing removal operations.
Environment setup is required before performing any modification operations on the bag.
Both methods verify the state of the bag after modifications and handle similar exceptions.
